𝗢𝗣𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗜𝗔 | Automating browser tasks using AI models, including content creation, social media management, productivity, research, development, and testing.  🔥 Super Hot!

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📜 JavaScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Automating browser tasks using AI models, including content creation, social media management, productivity, research, development, and testing.
📅 Created: Jun 2025 • Updated: Jul 2025

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Connects AI models to browsers for automation.
✅ Leverages existing browser data (accounts, passwords, cookies).
✅ Supports multiple Chromium-based browsers.
✅ Privacy-focused, runs locally.
✅ Supports various AI models (Claude, ChatGPT, Cursor).


⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐ 570 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 48 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 5 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

OpenDia is a browser extension that allows AI models to control and automate tasks within Chromium-based browsers. It leverages existing browser data and supports various AI models, enabling users to automate workflows such as social media posting, content summarization, web application testing, and research, all while maintaining privacy by running locally.

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/aaronjmars/opendia

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Assisting with manually counting objects in images, particularly for wildlife research.
📅 Created: Jan 2019 • Updated: Jul 2025

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

✅ Manual object counting in images
✅ Point data collection for training and validation
✅ Cross-platform compatibility (Ubuntu)
✅ Open-source

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

DotDotGoose is an open-source tool designed to aid in the manual counting of objects within images. It facilitates the collection of point data, which can be valuable for training and validating computer-assisted counting models. The tool is primarily intended for use in fields like wildlife research, where accurate object counts are crucial.

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

𝗧𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗦𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗠𝗘𝗥𝗟𝗔𝗕-𝗔𝗣𝗣 | Experimenting with, training, fine-tuning, and evaluating Large Language Models on a local machine.  🔥 Super Hot!

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📘 TypeScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Experimenting with, training, fine-tuning, and evaluating Large Language Models on a local machine.
📅 Created: Dec 2023 • Updated: Jul 2025

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ One-click download of popular models
✅ Finetuning/training across different hardware (MLX, GPU)
✅ RLHF and Preference Optimization (DPO, ORPO, SIMPO)
✅ Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, MacOS, Linux)
✅ Chat with models (Chat, Completions, Preset Prompts)
✅ Multiple Inference Engines (MLX, Huggingface Transformers, vLLM, Llama CPP)
✅ Model Evaluation
✅ RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)
✅ Dataset Building
✅ Embedding Calculation
✅ REST API
✅ Cloud Support
✅ Model Conversion (Huggingface, MLX, GGUF)
✅ Plugin Support
✅ Embedded Monaco Code Editor


⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 3.5K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 302 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 47 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Transformer Lab is an open-source application designed for advanced LLM and diffusion engineering. It enables users to interact with, train, fine-tune, and evaluate large language models on their own computers. The application supports various features, including one-click model downloads, cross-platform compatibility, multiple inference engines, and tools for RAG, dataset building, and model conversion.

⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

LibreLingo is a community-owned language learning platform that offers interactive exercises and spaced repetition to help users learn new languages. It features progress tracking and cross-device synchronization, making it accessible on various devices. The platform emphasizes free and open-source courses, promoting community contribution and ownership.

╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌

𝗡𝗜𝗠𝗕𝗨𝗦 | Open source alternative to cloud storage solutions like Google Drive, OneDrive, and iCloud.  🔥 Super Hot!

❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Open source alternative to cloud storage solutions like Google Drive, OneDrive, and iCloud.
📅 Created: May 2025 • Updated: Jul 2025

✅ Cloud storage
✅ PostgreSQL database support
✅ Valkey caching support
✅ Google authentication
✅ Microsoft authentication

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Nimbus is an open-source cloud storage solution designed as an alternative to mainstream services. It utilizes PostgreSQL for data storage and Valkey for caching. The platform supports user authentication via Google and Microsoft, providing a comprehensive and self-hostable cloud storage experience.

❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖❖

𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗘𝗕𝗥𝗢𝗪𝗦𝗘𝗥 | Web-based file management and browsing.  🔥 Super Hot!

🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Web-based file management and browsing.
📅 Created: Jun 2023 • Updated: Jul 2025

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

✅ Multiple sources support
✅ Login support for OIDC, password + 2FA, and proxy
✅ Revamped UI
✅ Simplified configuration via config.yaml
✅ Ultra-efficient indexing and real-time updates
✅ Better listing browsing with more file type previews
✅ Developer API support with Swagger page


✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

FileBrowser Quantum is a web-based file manager that provides an easy way to access and manage files from the web. It offers features such as multiple source support, various login options, a revamped UI, simplified configuration, efficient indexing, improved browsing, and a developer API, making it a comprehensive solution for self-hosted file browsing.

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧
